Description.Text: Golden Palace Hotel Tsakhkadzor is a luxury 5-star superior property offering stylish accommodation near the heart of Tsaghkadzor. Highlights include onsite dining, stunning interiors, an indoor swimming pool, a spa, tennis court and cigar bar. Tsaghkadzor is a spa town and a popular ski resort located to the north of Yerevan. Nearby places of interest include Kecharis Monastery, Meghradzor Church and Bjni Fortress. The hotel occupies a grand mid-rise property with a domed roof. Facilities include an indoor swimming pool, a tennis court, whirlpool, sauna, steam room, billiards room, kids' club, casino and a spa that offers a range of beauty and massage treatments. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Standard rooms are 29sqm and decorated in a bright, classic style with dark wood furniture. Amenities include a flat-screen satellite TV, safe and work desk. The en-suite bathrooms feature a bathtub or shower. The gastronomic restaurant offers regional and international dishes in a sophisticated and elegant setting, while guests can enjoy a range of drinks and snacks at the stylish hotel bar, which features a fireplace. The 24-hour cigar bar offers live music, excellent cigars and cocktails, while a buffet breakfast is provided every morning. Free parking is possible onsite. The hotel provides 24-hour reception and room service.
